aboutpara: I am a second year Computer Science student at Wayne State University. I am on track to graduate to graduate in 2024 with a 4.0 GPA. I really enjoy learning to code and try to absorb as much knowledge as possible before I graduate. I am currently searching for internships that will push me academically.
